title: Weapons I'd like to see in league.
body:
I'd like to see more flintlock based weaponry. Like muskets and pistols. I know MF and GP use flintlock pistols (or the weapons are based off them) so it'd be interesting to see a musket or blunderbuss (probably spelled wrong). 

I'd also like to see sabers and scimitars. And bec de Corbins and Horseman picks. 
Edit: References
Horseman's pick
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f9/Polish_Horseman's_picks_from_XVII_century.PNG/166px-Polish_Horseman's_picks_from_XVII_century.PNG
Bec de Corbin
http://discoverthemiddleages.com/img/full/Bec%20De%20Corbin%201.jpg

Similar right?


What weapons would you be interested to see?

Edit:  Another weapon I'd like to see is the Aztec weapon Macuahuitl 

http://www.aztec-history.com/images/76xNxmaquahuitl.gif.pagespeed.ic.kFz48s0vcH.png

Can we seriously have something like that?!  Can we have a society with Aztecian similarities deep in the kumungu jungle?

replies.body:
I'd like to see Tonfa, because I've trained with them in the past and they're pretty awesome. My inner martial artist says traditional ones would be best, but I wouldn't be averse to the bladed tonfa variant that afaik actually doesn't exist in reality. Still cool though.

For those who don't know what a tonfa is, it's this:

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3d/Tonfas.jpg

Usually wielded as a pair with the long part going along your forearm, proper tonfa usage involves being able to spin them out to strike with the long end and flipping them in your hand to wield them like a hammer or mace.
A Scourge, or just a normal Whip if that's too much. I also would like to see more musical weapons.
You sayin bard and sona ain't got mad beets?
Well no, I'm just saying you can never have enough mad beats.

The league has tons of Knives, but i would like to see someone using a deadliest silverware.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9VDvgL58h_Y

... Spoons.

Seriously, spoons are badass.

http://img01.deviantart.net/6842/i/2013/302/d/f/mega_alakazam_by_theangryaron-d6sahi5.png

Scythe. Scythes are in skins but I would want it on classic champion, who uses scythe.

Maybe for a funny skin, but I can't see Riot making a legit champion with a blender.

Q: He launches an assortment of vegetables out of his blender, slowing enemies and healing allies.
W: He shoots slime on the ground, damaging enemies.
E: He shoots out a blade from his blender which astounds the enemy, silencing them, as the blade bounces back and forth between them.
R: He pulls enemies towards them (Into his Blender) and deals TONS OF DAMAGE to all in that range as he makes a nice stew from their bodies.
